name: continued
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(also continuing) still happening, existing, or done: Continued fighting in the city is causing great concern.
(written abbreviation cont.) often used at the bottom of a page to show that the story, article, etc. is not finished: continued on page 7
More examplesFewer examplesThe team's continued involvement in the competition is uncertain.I'm reckoning on your continued support.Police urged continued vigilance in the fight against crime.The continued lack of rain is starting to worry people.The continued supply of arms to the region will only worsen the situation.
